title: Chapter 995 - Yama’S Tribulation
volume_title: A Sword Cleaves A Path Through The Netherworld
body:
Chapter 995 - Yama’S Tribulation

Even Ye Luo had no choice but to admit that the woman in front of him was a heart-stirring, soul-shaking beauty. 

Her inky dress didn’t just outline her graceful, prideworthy curves. It also contrasted with her snowy, lustrous skin. Her long blue hair was tied into a loose bun, emphasizing her long neck and exquisite features.

If she were simply an extraordinary beauty, it would have been one thing.

But she also had an extraordinary bearing. She seemed calm and elegant, but beneath her charming facade, she was as proud and contemptuous as a sovereign, and her majestic aura was awe-inspiring.

Some people saw her as a queen from beyond the nine heavens, one they could not blaspheme against.

Others saw her as the type of unmatched beauty who brought disaster to the populace. She could ignite the most basal desires of the human heart.

Even Ye Luo’s mind felt a bit shaken, and he inwardly cried out, “Enchantress!”

But Su Yi was in no mood to appreciate her beauty. He merely glanced at the smiling Netherworld King, then continued on his way.

Ye Luo followed shortly after.

???

He’s ignoring me, just like that? 

The Netherworld King’s beautiful eyes darted about. She caught up to them and asked Ye Luo, “What do you call yourself, Fellow Daoist?”

Ye...
